title: OPL Finals Cosplay Contest Results
body:
Hey everyone,

The response to the OPL Finals Cosplay Competition has been amazing! The quality of the entries you all sent through has had our judging panel tied up in knots trying to pick the winners. 

The panel selected the winning entries based on their accuracy, the craftsmanship involved in creating their costumes, and their ability to embody the champion in personality and mannerism.

We have also decided to add an additional category of 8 honourable mentions on top of the 22 winners because the entries were just that good. 

Be sure to check out the full gallery of entries here: [http://woobox.com/a7yooe](http://woobox.com/a7yooe)

**Winners:**

All winning entries will receive accommodation and flights to Sydney to be part of the Cosplay Showcase at the OPL Finals at Luna Park on August 8.

**Honourable Mentions:**

All honourable mentions will receive a ticket to the OPL Finals and the OPL Show Bag.

If you’re coming to the OPL Finals at Luna Park, make sure to keep an eye out for these amazing cosplayers around the park and on the community stage!
